verses.verse: And when the people<WH5971> saw<WH7200> that Moses<WH4872> delayed<WH954> to come<WH3381> down<WH3381> out of the mount,<WH2022> the people<WH5971> gathered<WH6950> themselves together to Aaron,<WH175> and said<WH559> to him, Up, make<WH6213> us gods,<WH430> which<WH834> shall go<WH3212> before<WH6440> us; for as for this<WH2088> Moses,<WH4872> the man<WH376> that brought<WH5927> us up out of the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> we know<WH3045> not what<WH4100> is become<WH1961> of him.

And Aaron<WH175> said<WH559> to them, Break<WH6561> off the golden<WH2091> earrings,<WH5141> which<WH834> are in the ears<WH241> of your wives,<WH802> of your sons,<WH1121> and of your daughters,<WH1323> and bring<WH935> them to me.
And all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> broke<WH6561> off the golden<WH2091> earrings<WH5141> which<WH834> were in their ears,<WH241> and brought<WH935> them to Aaron.<WH175>

And he received<WH3947> them at their hand,<WH3027> and fashioned<WH3335> it with a engraving<WH2747> tool, after he had made<WH6213> it a molten<WH4541> calf:<WH5695> and they said,<WH559> These<WH428> be your gods,<WH430> O Israel,<WH3478> which<WH834> brought<WH5927> you up out of the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>

And when Aaron<WH175> saw<WH7200> it, he built<WH1129> an altar<WH4196> before<WH6440> it; and Aaron<WH175> made proclamation,<WH7121> and said,<WH559> To morrow<WH4279> is a feast<WH2282> to the LORD.<WH3068>

And they rose<WH7925> up early<WH7925> on the morrow,<WH4283> and offered<WH5927> burnt<WH5930> offerings, and brought<WH5066> peace<WH8002> offerings; and the people<WH5971> sat<WH3427> down to eat<WH398> and to drink,<WH8354> and rose<WH6965> up to play.<WH6711>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> Go,<WH3212> get<WH3381> you down;<WH3381> for your people,<WH5971> which<WH834> you brought<WH5927> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> have corrupted<WH7843> themselves:

They have turned<WH5493> aside quickly<WH4118> out of the way<WH1870> which<WH834> I commanded<WH6680> them: they have made<WH6213> them a molten<WH4541> calf,<WH5695> and have worshipped<WH7812> it, and have sacrificed<WH2076> thereunto, and said,<WH559> These<WH428> be your gods,<WH430> O Israel,<WH3478> which<WH834> have brought<WH5927> you up out of the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>
And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> I have seen<WH7200> this<WH2088> people,<WH5971> and, behold,<WH2009> it is a stiff necked<WH7186> <WH6203> people:<WH5971>
Now<WH6258> therefore let me alone, that my wrath<WH639> may wax hot<WH2734> against them, and that I may consume<WH3615> them: and I will make<WH6213> of you a great<WH1419> nation.<WH1471>

And Moses<WH4872> sought<WH2470> the LORD<WH3068> his God,<WH430> and said,<WH559> LORD,<WH3068> why<WH4100> does your wrath<WH639> wax hot<WH2734> against your people,<WH5971> which<WH834> you have brought<WH3318> forth<WH3318> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> with great<WH1419> power,<WH3581> and with a mighty<WH2389> hand?<WH3027>

Why<WH4100> should the Egyptians<WH4714> speak,<WH559> and say,<WH559> For mischief<WH7451> did he bring<WH3318> them out, to slay<WH2026> them in the mountains,<WH2022> and to consume<WH3615> them from the face<WH6440> of the earth?<WH127> Turn<WH7725> from your fierce<WH2740> wrath,<WH639> and repent<WH5162> of this evil<WH7451> against your people.<WH5971>

Remember<WH2142> Abraham,<WH85> Isaac,<WH3327> and Israel,<WH3478> your servants,<WH5650> to whom<WH834> you swore<WH7650> by your own self, and said<WH1696> to them, I will multiply<WH7235> your seed<WH2233> as the stars<WH3556> of heaven,<WH8064> and all<WH3605> this<WH2063> land<WH776> that I have spoken<WH559> of will I give<WH5414> to your seed,<WH2233> and they shall inherit<WH5157> it for ever.<WH5769>
And the LORD<WH3068> repented<WH5162> of the evil<WH7451> which<WH834> he thought<WH1696> to do<WH6213> to his people.<WH5971>

And Moses turned,<WH6437> and went<WH3381> down<WH3381> from the mount,<WH2022> and the two<WH8147> tables<WH3871> of the testimony<WH5715> were in his hand:<WH3027> the tables<WH3871> were written<WH3789> on both<WH8147> their sides;<WH5676> on the one side and on the other<WH2088> were they written.<WH3789>
And the tables<WH3871> were the work<WH4639> of God,<WH430> and the writing<WH4385> was the writing<WH4385> of God,<WH430> graven<WH2801> on the tables.<WH3871>
And when Joshua<WH3091> heard<WH8085> the noise<WH6963> of the people<WH5971> as they shouted,<WH7452> he said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> There is a noise<WH6963> of war<WH4421> in the camp.<WH4264>

And he said,<WH559> It is not the voice<WH6963> of them that shout<WH6030> for mastery,<WH1369> neither<WH369> is it the voice<WH6963> of them that cry<WH6030> for being overcome:<WH2476> but the noise<WH6963> of them that sing<WH6031> do I hear.<WH8085>

And it came<WH1961> to pass, as soon<WH834> as he came<WH7126> near<WH7126> to the camp,<WH4264> that he saw<WH7200> the calf,<WH5695> and the dancing:<WH4246> and Moses'<WH4872> anger<WH639> waxed hot,<WH2734> and he cast<WH7993> the tables<WH3871> out of his hands,<WH3027> and broke<WH7665> them beneath<WH8478> the mount.<WH2022>

And he took<WH3947> the calf<WH5695> which<WH834> they had made,<WH6213> and burnt<WH8313> it in the fire,<WH784> and ground<WH2912> it to powder,<WH1854> and strewed<WH2219> it on the water,<WH4325> and made the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> drink<WH8248> of it.
And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to Aaron,<WH175> What<WH4100> did<WH6213> this<WH2088> people<WH5971> to you, that you have brought<WH935> so great<WH1419> a sin<WH2401> on them?
And Aaron<WH175> said,<WH559> Let not the anger<WH639> of my lord<WH113> wax hot:<WH2734> you know<WH3045> the people,<WH5971> that they are set on mischief.<WH7451>

For they said<WH559> to me, Make<WH6213> us gods,<WH430> which<WH834> shall go<WH3212> before<WH6440> us: for as for this<WH2088> Moses,<WH4872> the man<WH376> that brought<WH5927> us up out of the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> we know<WH3045> not what<WH4100> is become<WH1961> of him.

And I said<WH559> to them, Whoever<WH4310> has any gold,<WH2091> let them break<WH6561> it off. So they gave<WH5414> it me: then I cast<WH7993> it into the fire,<WH784> and there came<WH3318> out this calf.<WH5695>
And when Moses<WH4872> saw<WH7200> that the people<WH5971> were naked;<WH6544> (for Aaron<WH175> had made them naked<WH6544> to their shame<WH8103> among their enemies:<WH6965>)

Then Moses<WH4872> stood<WH5975> in the gate<WH8179> of the camp,<WH4264> and said,<WH559> Who<WH4310> is on the LORD's<WH3068> side? let him come to me. And all<WH3605> the sons<WH1121> of Levi<WH3878> gathered<WH622> themselves together to him.

And he said<WH559> to them, Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> Put<WH7760> every man<WH376> his sword<WH2719> by his side,<WH3409> and go<WH5674> in and out from gate<WH8179> to gate<WH8179> throughout the camp,<WH4264> and slay<WH2026> every man<WH376> his brother,<WH251> and every man<WH376> his companion,<WH7453> and every man<WH376> his neighbor.<WH7138>

And the children<WH1121> of Levi<WH3878> did<WH6213> according to the word<WH1697> of Moses:<WH4872> and there fell<WH5307> of the people<WH5971> that day<WH3117> about three<WH7969> thousand<WH505> men.<WH376>

For Moses<WH4872> had said,<WH559> Consecrate<WH4390> <WH3027> yourselves<WH3027> today<WH3117> to the LORD,<WH3068> even<WH3588> every man<WH376> on his son,<WH1121> and on his brother;<WH251> that he may bestow<WH5414> on you a blessing<WH1293> this day.<WH3117>

And it came<WH1961> to pass on the morrow,<WH4283> that Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to the people,<WH5971> You have sinned<WH2398> a great<WH1419> sin:<WH2401> and now<WH6258> I will go<WH5927> up to the LORD;<WH3068> peradventure<WH194> I shall make an atonement<WH3722> for your sin.<WH2403>

And Moses<WH4872> returned<WH7725> to the LORD,<WH3068> and said,<WH559> Oh,<WH577> this<WH2088> people<WH5971> have sinned<WH2398> a great<WH1419> sin,<WH2401> and have made<WH6213> them gods<WH430> of gold.<WH2091>
Yet now,<WH6258> if<WH518> you will forgive<WH5375> their sin;<WH2403> and if<WH518> not, blot<WH4229> me, I pray<WH4994> you, out of your book<WH5612> which<WH834> you have written.<WH3789>
And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> Whoever<WH4310> <WH834> has sinned<WH2398> against me, him will I blot<WH4229> out of my book.<WH5612>

Therefore now<WH6258> go,<WH3212> lead<WH5148> the people<WH5971> to the place of which<WH834> I have spoken<WH1696> to you: behold,<WH2009> my Angel<WH4397> shall go<WH3212> before<WH6440> you: nevertheless in the day<WH3117> when I visit<WH6485> I will visit<WH6485> their sin<WH2403> on them.
And the LORD<WH3068> plagued<WH5062> the people,<WH5971> because<WH5921> <WH834> they made<WH6213> the calf,<WH5695> which<WH834> Aaron<WH175> made.<WH6213>
